DOC.brief_summary: FOSFORE study aims at identifying the barriers of cervical cancer screening in Reunion Island and key levers for improvment.
DOC.brief_title: Perceived Barriers of Cervical Cancer Screening in Reunion Island and Key Levers for Improvment
DOC.detailed_description: FOSFORE is a cross sectional KABP (Knowledge, Attitudes, Beliefs and Practices) telephone survey on cervical cancer screening from a sounding board of women aged between 25 and 65 years and living in Reunion Island. Sample size was estimated from local datas on cervical cancer screening.
DOC.criteria: Women aged between 25 and 65 yo living in Reunion Island speaking French, Creole or Shimaore language able to answer phone history of hysterectomy history of incomplete or total conisation
